Name: [Digital Day Out](/ddo/)
Description: A short (2 hour) workshop that introduced Coding in [Scratch](https://scratch.mit.edu/) and "unplugged" approaches for teaching Computational Thinking

Name: [CS 4 the WALC](/walc-2016/)
Description: A day-long workshop for a communiy of teachers that focused on teaching Coding in [Scratch](https://scratch.mit.edu/) to Primary School teachers.

Name: [CS 4 the CSO](/cso-2016/)
Description: A short (2 hour) workshop for a communiy of teachers that focused on teaching Coding in [Scratch](https://scratch.mit.edu/) to Primary School teachers.
